title: Did they lower RP value?
body: I bought a $25 rp card and only got 2600 rp when a year ago i got 3500 i was wondering if they lowered it or not?

replies.body: I'm not aware of any changes aside from the [CAD currency adjustment](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/tivmkQPs-rp-price-adjustment-in-canada-on-2152016) last year.  Unless you purchase RP during an RP Bonus sale or are using CAD, I'm not sure of any other changes.  Feel free to hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our billing team can offer more context.  Let me know if that clears things up!

You most likely bought it originally during a special or sale. They used to offer bonuses around Christmas time. Spend $25 get a bonus 900RP kinda thing. The original prices have never changed as far as i know.
